name: js_petfind_app
description: - Using Pet Finder API - Provides information about pets around your area - Search by pet category (cats, dogs, etc.), zipcode, city & state - Displays animal's name, age, shelter address, phone, email & an image - API returns more info description, vaccination, kids, altered, etc. - Fetch-JSONP package is for Cross-Domain Requests  - Creating custom module for form validation - Parcel is used to bundle assets together, to make it easier to deploy - Babel is used to create `dist/` folder which will be uploaded
